b:attr.name: src
b:attr.expr:value: (data:srcset ? resizeImage(data:image, data:srcset.first, data:ratio) : data:image) + ((data:image contains data:serve) and data:params ? ("-" + data:params) : "")

div.class: p-1 mt-1 rounded-.5 giscus-btn btn w-1/1

b:eval.expr: data:post.body snippet { length: 100, links: false, linebreaks: false, ellipsis: false }

article.class: bg-material shadow-elevation m:rounded-.5 m:p-2.5 p-1.5 fs-6

header.class: flex items-start relative z-20 m:mb-1.75 mb-1.25

div.class: flex flex-wrap g-1 items-center fs-7 mt-.75

b:include.name: @:image
b:include.data: { src: (data:post.author.authorPhoto.image ?: data:const.avatar), class: "rounded-full", alt: data:post.author.name, resize: 30, ratio: "1:1" }

nav.class: dropdown absolute shadow-elevation rounded-.5 gt:block color-text sy-1 p-1 r-0 t-0

main.class: nobel-main flex-1 o-hidden l:py-5 m:py-4 py-2

div.p: What you're looking for doesn't exist, but if you close your eyes and press F5, you might find something! Or maybe not...

div.class: monospace block fs-2 text-center fw-700 color-opaque

b:if.p: Useful content for users and developers. A great mix of community contributed ideas and my own imagination.

div.p: Subscribe to my content updates or buy me a coffee that will keep me up when developing at night.

a.class: jumbotron flex m:p-2.25 p-1.75 g-1.25 rounded-.5 brand-mailchimp box-elevation

div.div: Developers need coffee, it's scientifically proven.
